refnamediv.refpurpose: Get string value of a variable

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
stringstrval mixedvalue
Get the string value of a variable. See the documentation on string for more information on converting to string.
This function performs no formatting on the returned value. If you are looking for a way to format a numeric value as a string, please see sprintf or number_format.

&reftitle.parameters;
value
The variable that is being converted to a string.
value may be any scalar type or an object that implements the __toString() method. You cannot use strval on arrays or on objects that do not implement the __toString() method.

&reftitle.seealso;
